organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: After the Scarlet Knights’ fourth straight loss to St. John’s, Coach C. Vivian Stringer described their performance as “embarrassingly poor.”
snippet: After the Scarlet Knights’ fourth straight loss to St. John’s, Coach C. Vivian Stringer described their performance as “embarrassingly poor.”
